name: Giant Fire Elemental
condition_immunities: fatigue, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 4) fire damage  and the target suffers 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

actions.name: Wildfire (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The elemental moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can enter the spaces of hostile creatures but not end this movement there. When a creature shares its space with the elemental for the first time during this movement  the creature is subject to the elementals Fiery Aura and the elemental can make a slam attack against that creature.

special_abilities.name: Fire Form
special_abilities.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Fiery Aura
special_abilities.desc: A creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the fire elemental takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

special_abilities.name: Water Weakness
special_abilities.desc: The elemental takes 6 (1d12) cold damage if it enters a body of water or starts its turn in a body of water, is splashed with at least 5 gallons of water, or is hit by a water elementals slam attack.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
